nodes.bodyText: I'm not sure about keeping or removing this method.
You cannot remove it since it is still used in the file below. Try to remove it and compile the module.

Yes, now its used at more places.
Pesonally I would removed this method and all its usages, because I don't see any value testing if standard is not null as in other places null value is replaced by empty string.

Yes, now its used at more places.
Personally I would removed this method and all its usages, because I don't see any value testing if standard is not null. There are places where null is replaced by empty string.
If it worked, I would not be against such a change, of course :)

There are places where null is replaced by empty string.

Where is it? (If you know it, you should write it.)

Here: 
  
    
      netbeans/php/php.code.analysis/src/org/netbeans/modules/php/analysis/options/AnalysisOptions.java
    
    
         Line 96
      in
      ac4e72f
    
    
    
    

        
          
           public void setCodeSnifferStandard(String standard) {
OK, I'll leave the method as it is.
